body: The entire <CHOICE(A)> was silent except for the slow ticking of the clock, and my phone that I was about to throw out the window. I’d said yes to a third date about ten minutes ago, and already she’d sent me what felt like a dozen responses in a torturous rapid fire. Though I asked her out for a number of reasons, the most important one was because <CHOICE(B)> didn’t seem clingy. Now, she must have wanted to know where I was right at that second.

content.name: I responded quickly, "I’m at the library right now."
I put my phone in my pocket.
I purposefully open her messages, then put my phone away.
